message.content: {"id": "4964", "title": "Bug 4964: Automatic Code Assist needs to be smarter", "description": "Since 'DISPOSED' is first in the list and is selected, I ended up with 'button.DISPOSED', which isn't even close to what I want, and I have to delete it all and start again, paying more attention this time. Code assist should notice that I have typed a '(' and that this matches 'dispose()' far better than 'DISPOSED'. Either that, or it needs to be case sensitive when it is automatically inserting stuff.", "OB": "The automatic code assist feature in the SWT IDE does not consider the context of the code being typed and inserts incorrect suggestions.", "EB": "The automatic code assist should analyze the context and prioritize suggestions that match the typed code better.", "SR": "In build 204, I encountered an issue while writing SWT code. Upon typing 'button.dispose', I did not notice that the code assist list was up since I was not looking."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4964', 'title': 'Bug 4964Automatic Code Assist needs to be smarter', 'description': 'Since DISPOSED is first in the list and is selected, Iended up with:button.DISPOSEDwhich isn\'t even close to what I want, and I have to delete it all and startagain, paying more attention this time.Code assist should notice that I have typed a ( and that this matches "dispose()" far better than "DISPOSED".Either that, or it needs to be case sensitivewhen it is automatically inserting stuff. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Build 204While writing SWT code, I type the following:button.disposeAt this point, I do not realize that the code assist list is up because I amnot looking. '}
